contentrichtext.text: '''Robert Zimmerman''' or '''Zimmermann''' may refer to: *[[Robert Zimmerman (commentator)]], CNN contributor, Democratic strategist, and Democratic National Committeeman *Robert Allen Zimmerman, birth name of [[Bob Dylan]] (born 1941), American singer-songwriter *[[Robert C. Zimmerman]] (1910–1996), Wisconsin Secretary of State * [[Robert D. Zimmerman]] (born 1952), author * [[Robert von Zimmermann]] (1824–1898), Czech-born Austrian philosopher * [[Robert Zimmermann (painter)]] (1815–1864), landscape painter * [[Robert Zimmermann (footballer)]] (born 1963), former German football player {{hndis|Zimmerman, Robert}}
